title: Jennifer Westacott AC rejoins KPMG to champion inclusion and innovation
snippet: A long-time champion of equality, Jennifer Westacott AC has played a pivotal role in shaping an inclusive culture at KPMG Australia since returning to the firm as a Special Advisor in July 2024.

title: Jennifer Westacott AC - KPMG Australia | LinkedIn
snippet: The Business Council of Australia is the nation’s premier business organisation… · Experience: KPMG Australia · Education: UNSW · Location: Sydney · 500+ connections on LinkedIn. View Jennifer Westacott AC’s profile on LinkedIn, a professional community of 1 billion members.

title: KPMG announces three senior appointments - KPMG Australia
snippet: KPMG Australia is pleased to announce three senior appointments to the firm: David Bradbury as a Partner in the Consulting business; Jennifer Westacott AO as a Special Adviser to the firm’s client delivery teams; and Michael Ebeid AM as an Independent Adviser to the National Board.

title: KPMG announces three senior appointments | Media release
snippet: KPMG Australia is pleased to announce three senior appointments to the firm: David Bradbury as a Partner in the Consulting business; Jennifer Westacott AO as a Special Adviser to the firm’s client delivery teams; and Michael Ebeid AM as an Independent Adviser to the National Board.

title: Jennifer Westacott - Wikipedia
snippet: Following a career in the NSW and Victorian public sectors, she was a senior partner at KPMG in Sydney, Australia from 2005 to 2011, before assuming the role of chief executive of the Business Council of Australia. She is also a non-executive director of Wesfarmers.
